mapper.insert: insert into slip (slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status) values (#{slipnumber},#{total},sysdate,#{departmentname},#{jukyo},#{status})
mapper.select: select slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status from slip
select slipnumber, total, slipdate, departmentname, jukyo, status from slip where slipnumber = #{slipnumber}
